p: However, for C. krusei the antifungal activity was showed more active in second collection period (345.5 µg/mL) ( Fig. 1E) with significant value when compared to fluconazole IC 50 of 271.3 µg/mL ( Table 4). This result corroborates with an incidence of precipitation of 145 mm and presence of the major γ-terpinene, τ-cadinol and terpinolene compounds in the sample.
